Fatigue by lack of willpower

Ego depletion

Given heavy evidence against the resource-based ego-depletion model (see Hagger, M. S. /et al./) and casuistic studies showing that applying executive function doesn't necessarily result in the feeling of effort (see Naccache et al.) a new model for self-control seems appropriate. The following is based heavily on Inzlicht et al and Kurzban et al.
